title: ADT to Buy Solar-Panel Installer Sunpro Solar for About $825 Million
sub_head: Home-security company is seeking to offer more products and services to its residential customers
body:
ADT Inc. has struck a deal to buy a top solar-panel-installation company in a push to offer more products and services to its residential customers, the companies said.
The home-security company is buying Sunpro Solar for about $825 million, including debt, using $160 million in cash and 77.8 million shares of ADT stock.
